document.full_text: nastassia astrasheuskaya joined reuters as a correspondent in december 2010. she was born on aug. 31, 1989, in the belarussian city of mogilev, three years after the nuclear disaster at the ukrainian chernobyl, 500 km (320 miles) away.
document.title: witness: growing up in chernobyl's fallout zone
lines_and_colors: nastassia astrasheuskaya joined reuters as a correspondent in december 2010. she was born on aug. 31, 1989, in the belarussian city of mogilev, three years after the nuclear disaster at the ukrainian chernobyl, 500 km (320 miles) away.
